english.segment1: All that you say and reveal, all you command or conceal, all of your word here for me, all that you say is all that I need. Blest are the ones who will listen, blest are the ones who will hear. Speak, Lord while I am waiting, speak while my heart is near.
english.segment2: All that is true, all that's right, all that is pure radiant light, all of your heart here for me, all that you say is all that I need. And blest are the ones who will listen. Blest are the ones who will hear. Speak, Lord, while I am waiting, speak while my heart is near.
